member.name: F:Rhetos.Logging.EventType.Trace
member.summary: Very detailed logs, which may include high-volume information such as protocol payloads. This log level is typically only enabled for debugging.

member.name: F:Rhetos.Logging.EventType.Info
member.summary: Information messages, which are normally enabled in production environment and kept permanently.

member.name: F:Rhetos.Logging.EventType.Warning
member.summary: Warning messages, which are normally enabled in production environment and kept permanently.

member.name: F:Rhetos.Logging.EventType.Error
member.summary: Error messages, which are normally sent to administrator in production environment.

member.name: P:Rhetos.Logging.ILogger.Name
member.summary: Returns the logger name that was provided as argument for .

member.name: M:Rhetos.Logging.LoggerHelper.Write(Rhetos.Logging.ILogger,System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch,System.Func{System.String})
member.summary: Logs 'Trace' or 'Info' level, depending on the event duration. Restarts the stopwatch.

member.name: M:Rhetos.Logging.LoggerHelper.Write(Rhetos.Logging.ILogger,System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch,System.String)
member.summary: Logs 'Trace' or 'Info' level, depending on the event duration. Restarts the stopwatch.
